subject: Important question !!!
author: Luis
full_text: Hi , i have an important question , is about linear sweep circuit , whith opamp tl074 , the squematic dont say where must be conected the pins 4 and 11 , 11 is - amd 4 + .  How is the conection ? ... 11 to -12v or 0 . 4 to +12 ? .... I tried , and conecting 11 to 0 v , i got a triangular wave , but , i couldnt get a apropiate dc level , the minimum level i got was almost 14v , when i tried more low dc level , the wave lose the form , and the offset pot didnt go ok , it didnt have any effect in triangular wave .
